title: 06/21/2021 - HOUR 3 - Chris Mannix, Three Word Game
itunes:title: 06/21/2021 - HOUR 3 - Chris Mannix, Three Word Game
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Sports Illustrated senior NBA writer Chris Mannix joins The Herd to discuss the most recent chapter of the 2021 NBA playoffs. Also, Colin plays his Three Word Game for the eight NBA teams who made their respective conference semifinals.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
